TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TableCellsCollectionEditor extends System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor

summary.span: Udostępnia interfejs użytkownika do edycji Kolekcja komórek w wierszu tabeli.

span.span: Provides a user interface for editing the collection of cells in a table row.

remarks.format: ## Examples Poniższy przykład kodu wykorzystuje do skojarzenia `TableCellsCollectionEditor` klasy i klasą (Edytor kolekcji podstawową) z niestandardowego `TestCells` właściwości.The following code example uses the to associate the `TableCellsCollectionEditor` class and the class (the collection editor's base class) with a custom `TestCells` property. [!code-csharp[Design.WebControls_CollectionEditorSamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Design.WebControls_CollectionEditorSamples/CS/WebControlDesignerCollectionEditors.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Design.WebControls_CollectionEditorSamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Design.WebControls_CollectionEditorSamples/VB/webcontroldesignercollectioneditors.vb#1)]
